Steps (Step): Enter a username. Use no more than 100 characters.
Enter a password that consists of at least 4 characters, at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit 0-9 and one of the following special characters: !@#$%^&*

Steps (Expected Result): Creates a new account, a confirmation e-mail is sent to the given address and the user is informed about these actions.

Title: Correct 'Regulamin' link action
Preconditions: The app is opened and the option 'Rejestracja' is chosen.
